content:
CS 260P - Algorithms Final Exam Study Questions

The final exam is comprehensive. Thus, the previous study questions for Midterm 1 and Midterm 2 also apply to the final exam.

In addition to the readings, listed on the CS 260P Homework page, and the previous study questions, solving the following questions will provide a good preparation for the final exam.

  1. Problem R-15.1 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  2. Problem R-15.2 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  3. Problem R-15.3 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  4. Problem R-15.8 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  5. Problem R-15.9 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  6. Problem C-15.3 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  7. Problem C-15.4 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  8. Problem A-15.1 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  9. Problem R-16.4 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  10. Problem C-16.1 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  11. Problem C-16.3 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  12. Problem A-16.1 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  13. Problem C-17.11 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  14. Problem C-17.13 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  15. Problem A-17.5 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  16. Problem A-17.6 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  17. Problem R-18.3 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  18. Problem C-18.6 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  19. Problem C-19.16 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  20. Problem A-19.1 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
